function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sewage system containing complex microbial communities","Impact":"Spread of infectious diseases through wastewater","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced treatment methods to eliminate or reduce the presence of harmful microbes","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies, such as UV disinfection and membrane filtration","People":"Community members exposed to wastewater, wastewater treatment plant workers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, wastewater treatment plant operators"},{"Description":"Use of water fingerprinting for community-wide infectious disease diagnostics","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and misuse of collected data","Mitigation":"Implementing strict data privacy and security measures, obtaining consent for data collection","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage systems","People":"Community members being monitored, data analysts, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, data collection and analysis organizations"},{"Description":"Wide array of endogenous chemical and biological urinary biomarkers linked with disease","Impact":"Potential for misuse of biomarker data, misinterpretation of results leading to incorrect public health decisions","Mitigation":"Standardizing biomarker analysis and interpretation, providing comprehensive education on biomarker usage and limitations","Technologies":"Standardized biomarker analysis protocols, educational resources on biomarker interpretation","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
